subject: Re: autogen.sh fix for non-GNU systems
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Björn,

> ... like Solaris, which don't support things like [:alpha:] in tr.
> 
> If nobody says NO, can somebody check that in?

I don't have any problems on Solaris.  The patch looks fine
but I expect that you have /usr/ucb in your path.  That's
known to cause problems.




jerry
